text: The End of the Ring Wars is the first full-length album by Lawrence, Kansas- based emo group the Appleseed Cast, released on Deep Elm Records in 1998. ==Track listing== #"Marigold & Patchwork" (5:49) #"Antihero" (3:56) #"On Sidewalks" (3:41) #"Moment #72" (3:06) #"Stars" (3:58) #"December 27, 1990" (2:21) #"The Last Ring" (4:31) #"16 Days" (5:41) #"Dreamland" (5:45) #"Portrait" (4:44) #"Untitled 1/2" (4:23) ==References== ==External links== *The End of the Ring Wars at Deep Elm Records Category:1998 albums Category:The Appleseed Cast albums
title: The End of the Ring Wars
